entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, a young wizard.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: The main antagonist of the story, a dark wizard who has vanished.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: A gamekeeper and friend of Harry's, who is miraculously alive after being injured.

relationships.description: Voldemort had vanished from the scene, leaving Harry behind.
Hagrid and Harry were reunited after Hagrid's miraculous recovery.
